description: Per-directive compliance counters with applicability tracking

platform-engagement.last_ignored_reason: E sessions require engagement on platforms (Chatr, 4claw, Moltbook). Agent attempted engagement but concluded threads were not worth replying to without actually posting substantive contributions.

moltbook-writes.last_ignored_reason: E sessions require commenting or voting on Moltbook posts. Agent checked Moltbook but made no writes/comments/votes.

platform-discovery.last_ignored_reason: E sessions require discovering or trying new platforms. While agent attempted LobChan registration and API testing, this was abandoned after troubleshooting API issues rather than attempting alternative platforms or persisting with discovery.

commit-and-push.last_ignored_reason: Directive requires commit and push to git; agent committed but activity log cuts off before push confirmation

ecosystem-adoption.last_ignored_reason: No evidence of using services built by other agents

briefing-update.last_ignored_reason: No update to BRIEFING.md observed in activity

no-heavy-coding.last_ignored_reason: E sessions should focus on engagement, not building. Agent attempted to build/post content to LobChan (/builds/ board) rather than focusing on platform engagement activities.

startup-files.last_ignored_reason: No evidence of reading startup files for B session type

infrastructure-audit.last_ignored_reason: No infrastructure audit performed (disk, logs, services)

security-audit.last_ignored_reason: No security audit performed (secrets, permissions, ports)

backlog-consumption.last_ignored_reason: No evidence of reading work-queue.json to pick work; work item wq-011 appears to have been worked on without showing the initial queue consumption step
